text: Freedom is a 2004 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Thampi Kannanthanam, starring Jishnu Raghavan, Renuka Menon and Nithya Das in the lead role.http://www.nowrunning.com/movie/1748/malayalam/freedom/index.htm ==Cast== * KPAC Lalitha * Jishnu Raghavan as Lalan * Koottikkal Jayachandran * MS Thrippoonithura * Mamukkoya as aalikka * Nishanth Sagar as majeed * Nithya Das as shalini * Ponnamma Babu * Santosh As * Poojappura Ravi * Renuka Menon as Anjali * Shaaju * Maya Viswanath ==References== ==External links== * Category:2004 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by Thampi Kannanthanam
title: Freedom (2004 film)
